fields.Title of Presentation: The Shoebox: The Time Geometry Helped Save Two Accused Felons
fields.Conference/Meeting Name: Statewide Summer Academy on Mathematics Education
fields.Description/Abstract: When Irv and Christopher Gotti, founders of an infamous record label, went on trial for federal money-laundering crimes, the case unexpectedly turned to a shoebox. Should the jury believe a witness who claimed to see the defendants deliver a shoebox with $70,000 in cash? We’ll explore the problem, create mathematical models with geometry, collect data, and evaluating the witnesses’ claim.
